message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $9,500. This is a great price considering its worth to me.  What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product at a reasonable price. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9,000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm still hoping to get closer to my desired price. I'm willing to come down to $9,250. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's see if we can close this deal.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product to you. I would like to counter with an offer of $9,100 for the product.
